duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to exciting projects and help build the culture within the architecture firm.
Forecast and organize project design development and production delivery.
Identify and address design related issues and follow protocol and procedures to reach the best resolution.
Work on projects with Client/Owner/Contractor relationships, budget, schedule, code, and jurisdictional requirements.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Architecture from an accredited university.
Leadership skills in overseeing a team.
Understanding of construction processes and methods and how it impacts the project.
Ability to work well under pressure and prioritize tasks.
Experience working with governing authorities on obtaining building permits, documenting code review and approvals.
